name: SUPER-QUASAR
description:
SUPER-QUASAR is like an old-school arcade game brought into the modern day. It feels like Galaga or Space Invaders, but with more interesting enemies, smooth and crisp graphics, and hectic combat that was previously impossible but is made easy with today's hardware.

It's quick and easy to jump into, so give it a go! It has support for two-player co-op on one keyboard, and is a ton of fun with a friend or family member.
